titles.title: Authorizing the use of the rotunda of the Capitol for a ceremony to award the Congressional Gold Medal to the Tuskegee Airmen.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E486)

bill.summary:
3/5/2007--Introduced.
Authorizes the use of the Capitol rotunda on March 29, 2007, for a ceremony to award the Congressional Gold Medal collectively to the Tuskegee Airmen in accordance with Public Law 109-213.
